column5: Hey guys,  My friends and I just got into fishing recently when we went down to Rice Lake last weekend. We went to the Gores Landing docks and caught some sunfish but that was about it.. had a great time though. We live around Ajax and was wondering if theres a spot in and around a 30 minute drive radius where we could do some shore/dock fishing. If anyone has any suggestions, please let me know.  Thanks!
